juzs.text: 51|31|Kare wa itta. `Sore de, anata gata no o yōken wa nandesuka, shito no kata gata yo.'
51|32|Kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa tsumibukai min ni tsukawasa reta nodesu.
51|33|Doro no tsubute o (ame no yō ni) kare-ra no ue ni furasu tame ni.
51|34|Hō rachi o tsukusu mono ni taishite,-nushi no omoto de shirusa reta (doro no tsubute o furasou).' To itta.
51|35|Sore kara, ware wa soko ni ita shinja-tachi o tachi noka seyou to shita.
51|36|Shikashi, sono (machi no)-chū de miidashita musurimu no ie wa, tada no ikken dakedeatta.
51|37|Ware wa itamashī chōbatsu o, osoreru mono no tame ni hitotsu no shirushi to shite soko ni nokoshita.
51|38|Mata mūsā ni mo (shirushi ga atta). Ware ga akirakana ken'i o sazukete, kare o firuaun ni tsukawashita toki o omoiokose.
51|39|Kare (firuaun) wa sono kensei o kasa ni, se o muke,`koitsu wa majutsu-shi ka, soretomo kichigaida.' To itta.
51|40|Sorede are wa, kare to sono gunzei o toraete umi ni nagekonda. Hontōni kare wa, ke shikaranu monodeatta.
51|41|Mata ādo ni mo (shirushi ga atta). Ware ga sangai o motarasu kaze o kare-ra ni okutta toki o omoiokose.
51|42|Sore wa kare-ra o osotte, subete o kaimetsu shi haikyo no yō ni shite, nani mo nokosanakatta.
51|43|Mata samūdo ni mo (shirushi ga atta). `Tsukanoma (no anata gata no nama) o tanoshime.' To iwa reta toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
51|44|Sonotoki kare-ra wa,-nushi no meirei ni ōhei ni somuitanode, are yo to mite iru ma ni kaminari ni osowa reta.
51|45|Mohaya kare-ra wa oki noboru koto mo dekizu, mata mamoru koto mo dekinakatta.
51|46|Izen ni mo, nūfu no min o (ware wa horoboshita). Hontōni kare-ra wa hangyaku no mindeatta.
51|47|Ware wa iryoku o motte ten o uchi-date, hate shinai hirogari ni shita.
51|48|Mata ware wa daichi o uchi hirogeta. Nanto migoto ni hirogeta koto yo.
51|49|Mata ware wa, subete no mono o ryōsei ni tsukutta. Anata gata wa kunkai o ukeirerudearou (to iu hairyo kara).
51|50|`Sorede anata gata wa, arrā no higo no shita ni omomuke. Hontōni watashi wa kare kara anata gata ni tsukawasa reta kōmeina keikoku-shadearu.
51|51|Sore de arrā to issho ni soto no kami o tatete wa naranai. Hontōni watashi wa, kare kara anata gata ni tsukawasa reta kōmeina keikoku-shadearu'.
51|52|Dōyō ni kare-ra izen no mono mo, shito ga kare-ra ni yattekuru tabi ni,`majutsu-shi ka, matawa kichigaida.' To itta.
51|53|Kare-ra wa sore o ikun to shite keishō shite kita no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa hōgai no mindearu.
51|54|Sore de, kare-ra o sakete sare. Anata gata wa (kare-ra no okonai ni taishite) togame wa nai nodearu.
51|55|Daga kunkai shi nasai. Kunkai wa shinja-tachi o ekisuru.
51|56|Jin to ningen o tsukutta no wa ware ni tsukae saseru tame.
51|57|Ware wa kare-ra ni don'na kate mo motomezu, mata fuyō sa reru koto mo motomenai.
51|58|Hontōni arrā koso wa, kate o sadzuke rareru okata, kengonaru iryoku no omode ara reru.
51|59|Akugyō no to no sazukari-bun (batsu) wa, kare-ra no nakama no sazukari-bun (batsu) to onajidearou.Dakara sō (ware o) sekitatenakute mo ī.
51|60|Shinkō shinai mono ni wazawai are. Yakusoku no hi ga kare-ra ni kanarazu yattekuru.
52|1|Kano (keiji no) yama ni kakete (chikau).
52|2|Seizento kakishirusa reta Keisuke ni kakete,
52|3|maka rete inai yōhishi ni,
52|4|fudan ni mōde rareru seiden ni kakete,
52|5|takaku kakage rareta tengai ni kakete,
52|6|minagiri afureru taiyō ni kakete (chikau).
52|7|Hontōni omo no chōbatsu wa kanarazu kudaru.
52|8|Sore wa sake enai.
52|9|Sonohi, ten wa ōini yurayura to yure,
52|10|mata yamayama wa yurugi ugokudearou.
52|11|Sonohi,(shinri o) kyogidearu to shita mono ni wazawai are.
52|12|Munashī koto ni tawamurete ita-sha-tachi ni.
52|13|Kare-ra ga (monosugoi chikara de) jigoku no hi no naka ni tsuki otosa reru sonohi,
52|14|(kō iwa reyou. ) `Kore koso wa, anata gataga kyogidearu to shite ita jigoku no gōkadearu.
52|15|Kore demo majutsuna no ka. Soretomo anata gata wa, mienai no ka.
52|16|Anata gata wa soko de yaka reruga ī. Anata gataga sore o taeshinon demo, shinobanakute mo onaji koto. Anata gataga okonatta koto ni, mukui rareru dakedearu.'
52|17|-Nushi o osoreta-sha-tachi wa kanarazu rakuen no yorokobi no naka ni 置Ri,
52|18|-nushi ga kare-ra ni ataeru mono ni kanki shi, mata omo ga goku hi no chōbatsu kara kare-ra o sukuwa reta koto o yorokobu.
52|19|(Kare-ra ni wa iwa reyou. ) `Tanoshinde tabe, katsu nome. Kore mo anata gata no (yoi) okonai no tamedearu.'
52|20|Kare-ra wa narabe rareta sofā ni yorikakari, ware wa utsukushī-me no otome-tachi o kare-ra no haigūsha ni surudearou.

52|21|Shinkō suru mono-tachi, mata kare-ra ni shitagatta shinjinbukai shison no mono-tachi, ware wa, sorera no mono o (rakuen ni oite) isshonisuru. Kare-ra no subete no kōi ni taishi, sukoshi mo (hōshō o) keigen shinaidearou. Daremoga sono kasegi ni taishi, hōshū o ukeru.
52|22|Mata ware wa kudamono, niku, sono soto kare-ra no nozomu mono o ataeyou.
52|23|Kare-ra wa soko de tagaini hai o kawasou. Sono tokini mo munashī hanashi ni fukeru koto naku, ranbō mo okasanai.
52|24|Kare-ra no shū ni wa, hime rareta shinju no yōna kodomo ga kashizuite meguru.
52|25|Kare-ra wa tagaini chikayotte, tazune ai,
52|26|itte ita. `Izen, watashi-tachi wa kazoku no ma ni ite mo itsumo ki o nokotte ita.
52|27|Daga arrā wa, watashi-tachi ni onmegumi o atae rare, neppū no chōbatsu kara o sukui kudasa reta.
52|28|Izen kara watashi-tachi wa, kare ni inotte ita nodesu. Hontōni kare wa megumi atsuku, jihibukaki okata de ara reru'
52|29|sā, kare-ra ni kunkai shi nasai. Omo no onkei ni yotte, anata wa uranaishi demo kichigai demonai.
52|30|Mata kare-ra wa,`tada no shijinda. Kare no unsei ga gyakuten suru no o matou' to iu.
52|31|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Matte iruga ī. Watashi mo anata gata to tomoni matte iyou.'
52|32|Ittai kare-ra no mazushī rikai-ryoku ga kō meijita no ka, soretomo kare-ra wa hōgaina min'na no ka.
52|33|Matawa,`kare (muhanmado) ga kore o gisaku shita nodearu.' To iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa shinjite wa inai nodearu.
52|34|Moshi kare-ra no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, kore to onaji o tsuge o motte kosa seruga yoi.
52|35|Kare-ra wa mu kara tsukura reta node wanai ka. Soretomo kare-ra jishin ga sōzō-shana no ka.
52|36|Soretomo kare-ra ga, ten to ji o sōzō shita no ka. Iya, kare-ra ni wa shikkari shita shinkō ga nai nodearu.
52|37|Soretomo kare-ra wa, anata no omo no samazamana takaramono o motte iru no ka. Matawa (jibutsu no) kanrishana no ka.
52|38|Soretomo kare-ra ni wa hashigo ga atte, sorede (ten ni nobori, sono himitsu o) kiku koto ga dekiru no ka. Sorenara kiita to iu mono ni, meikakuna shōko o motte kitasa seruga yoi.
52|39|Soretomo anata gata ni wa musuko ga atte, kare ni wa musume ga aru (dake) to iu no ka.
52|40|Soretomo anata ga, kare-ra ni hōshū o motome, sore de kare-ra wa fusai no omoni o otte iru to iu no ka.
52|41|Soretomo yūgen-kai no koto ga sukkari wakatte ite, sore o kakitomete iru to iu no ka.
52|42|Soretomo (anata ni taishite) sakuwomegurasu tsumori ka. Daga haishin-sha-tachi koso, sakubō ni kakarudearou.
52|43|Soretomo kare-ra wa, arrā igai ni kami ga aru to iu no ka. Arrā ni tatae are, kare wa haisuru mono (jashin) no ue ni ito takaku ora reru.
52|44|Tatoe ten'noikkaku ga (kare-ra no ue ni) ochiru no o mite mo, kare-ra wa,`tsumikasanatta kumodesu.' To iudearou.
52|45|Kare-ra wa,(osore no tame ni) soko ni kontō suru (shinpan no)-bi ni au made, hanatte oke.
52|46|Sonohi kare-ra no sakubō wa, nani no eki mo naku, kekkyoku kare-ra wa tasuke rarenaidearou.
52|47|Hontōni fugina okonai no mono ni wa, kono soto ni mo chōbatsu ga aru. Daga, kare-ra no ōku wa kidzukanai.
52|48|Sore de omo no sabaki o taeshinonde mate. Hontōni ware wa anata gata o mimamotte iru. Soshite anata ga tachiagaru toki wa,-nushi o tatae nasai.
52|49|Yonaka ni, mata shinshin ga shirizoku toki ni mo, kare o tatae nasai.
53|1|Shizumi yuku hoshi ni kakete (chikau).
53|2|Anata gata no dōryō wa, mayotte iru node wa naku, mata machigatte iru node mo nai.
53|3|Mata (jibun no) nozomu koto o itte iru node mo nai.
53|4|Sore wa kare ni keiji sa reta, o tsuge nihokanaranai.
53|5|Narabinai iryoku no mochinushi ga, kare ni oshieta no wa,
53|6|sugureta chiryoku no mochinushidearu. Massugu ni tatte,
53|7|kare wa chihei no mottomo takai tokoro ni arawareta.
53|8|Sore kara orite kite, chikadzuita.
53|9|Oyoso yumi 2tsu, iya sore yori mo chikai kyorideatta ka.
53|10|Soshite shimo be (muhanmado) ni, kare no keiji o tsugeta.
53|11|Kokoro wa jibun ga mita koto o itsuwaranai.
53|12|Kare no mita koto ni tsuite, anata gata wa kare to ronsō suru no ka.
53|13|Hontōni kare (muhanmado) wa, saido no kōka ni oite mo, kare (jiburīru) o mita nodearu.
53|14|(Dare mo kosenai) 涯 Ni aru, su~idora ki no hata de.
53|15|Sono soba ni tsui no sumai no rakuen ga aru.
53|16|Ōu mono ga su~idora ki o konmori to ōu toki.
53|17|(Kare no) shisen wa suiyose rare, mata (bushitsuke ni)-do o sugosu koto mo nai.
53|18|Kare wa tashika ni,-nushi no ō no shirushi o mita nodearu.
53|19|Anata gata wa, arrāto to uzzā o (nanidearu to) kangaeru ka.
53|20|Sore kara dai 3-banme no manāto o.
53|21|Anata gata ni wa danshi ga ari, kare ni wa joshi ga aru to iu no ka.
53|22|Soredewa, hontōni futōna wakekatadearou.

53|23|Sorera wa, anata gata ya sosen-tachi ga nadzuketa (tada no) namae ni suginai. Arrā wa (don'na) ken'i o mo, sorera ni kudasa renakatta. Kare-ra (fushinjin-sha) wa, munashī okusoku ya shiyoku ni shitagatte iru nisuginai. Sudeni omo kara no michibiki ga, kare-ra ni kite irunoni.
53|24|Oyoso ningen ni wa, hoshīmono wa nani demo te ni hairu no ka.
53|25|Iya, raise mo gense mo, arrā no yūdearu.
53|26|Ten ni ikaga ni tenshi ga ite mo, arrā ga nozoma re, sono o yorokobi ni azukaru mono ni taisuru o yurushi ga deta nochidenakereba, kare-ra (tenshi) no torinashi wa nani no yaku ni mo tatanai.
53|27|Hontōni raise o shinjinai mono wa, tenshi ni josei no na o tsuke tari suru.
53|28|Kare-ra wa (nani no) chishiki mo naku, okusoku ni shitagau dakedearu. Daga shinri ni taishite wa, okusoku nado nani mo yakudatsu wake wanai.
53|29|Sorede anata wa ware no kunkai ni sewomukeru-sha, mata konoyo no seikatsu shika nozomanai mono kara tōzakare.

53|30|Kono teido (gense no seikatsu) ga, kare-ra no chishiki no todoku genkaidearu. Hontōni omo wa,-dō kara mayotte iru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Mata kare wa, michibiki o ukeru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru.
53|31|Hontōni ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono wa, arrā no yūdearu. Dakara akugyō no itazurani wa fusawashī mukui o atae rare, mata zenkō no itazurani wa saizen no mono de mukuwa reru.

53|32|Chīsai go chi wa betsu to shite, taizai ya harenchina kōi o yokeru mono ni wa,-nushi no yōsha wa hontōni kōdaidearu. Kare wa daichi kara tsukuridasa reta toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mata, anata gataga haha no tainai ni hisonde ita toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Dakara, anata gata wa jibun de seijō butte wa naranai. Kare wa omo o osoreru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru.
53|33|Anata wa (shinri kara) somuki saru mono o mita ka.
53|34|Wazuka ni hodokoshi o shite wa,(-mono ka mi shite) tomeru.
53|35|Sōiu mono ni yūgen-kai no chishiki ga atte, sorede nani demo mieru to iu no ka.
53|36|Soretomo, mūsā no sho ni aru koto ga, tsuge rareta koto wa nai no ka.
53|37|Mata (yakusoku o) kanzen ni hatashita iburāhīmu no koto mo.
53|38|Omoni o ou mono wa, tanin no omoni o ou koto wa dekinai.
53|39|Ningen wa, sono doryoku shita mono igai, nani mo eru koto wa dekinai.
53|40|Sono doryoku (no seika) wa, yagate mitomerarerudearou.
53|41|Yagate hōshō wa, jūbun ni mukui rareru.
53|42|Hontōni anata no omoni koso, kichaku-sho wa aru.
53|43|Kare koso wa, warawase nakaseru okata.
53|44|Mata shina se, ikasu okatadearu.
53|45|Hontōni kare wa, otome no kumiawase o tsukura reta.
53|46|Sore mo seieki o fukikomu koto de.
53|47|Mata 2-dome no sōzō (no fukkatsu) mo, kare no okokoro no mamadearu.
53|48|Kare koso wa toma se, mata michitari saseru okata.
53|49|Mata ōkami hoshi (Shiriusu) no omo mo kono okata.
53|50|Kare wa mukashi ādo (no min) o horoboshi.
53|51|Mata samūdo mo hitori nokosazu horobosa reta.
53|52|Sore izen ni nūfu no min mo. Hontōni kare-ra wa, hidoi fugi, fusei no yakaradeatta.
53|53|Mata (sodomutogomora no yō ni) tenpuku sa reta sho toshi.
53|54|Soshite kare wa sore o ōi sara reta.
53|55|(Hitobito yo,) ittai-nushi no dono o megumi ni, anata gata wa iron o daku no ka.
53|56|Kore wa, mukashi no keikoku-sha-tachi to onaji hitori no keikoku-shadearu.
53|57|(Shinpan no toki wa) chikaku ni sematte kite iru.
53|58|Sore wa arrā no soto nanimono mo akiraka ni shi e enai.
53|59|Anata gata hako no hanashi o kiite odoroite iru no ka.
53|60|Chōshō wa shite mo, nakanai no ka.
53|61|Anata gata wa, ji 惚 No naka de toki o sugosu no ka.
53|62|Ichizu ni arrā ni sajida shi,(kare ni) tsukae nasai.
54|1|Toki wa chikadzuki, tsuki wa mijin ni saketa.
54|2|Kare-ra wa tatoe shirushi o mite mo, somuki satte,`koreha aikawarazu no majutsuda.' To iudearou.
54|3|Kare-ra wa (kunkai o) kyogidearu to shi, jibun no yokubō ni shitagatte kita. Daga issai no koto ni wa, sadame rareta ketsumatsu ga aru.
54|4|Kore made, samazamana shōsoku wa, sudeni motarasa re, sorede jūbun jisei dekita hazu.
54|5|Sore wa mezamashī eichideatta. Daga keikoku wa yakudatanakatta.
54|6|Dakara anata wa, kare-ra kara tōzakare. Shōshū-sha ga kirawa reru tokoro e yobidasu hi.
54|7|Kare-ra wa me o fusete, chōdo batta ga chirabaru yō ni hakaba kara dete kite,
54|8|shōshū-sha no kata ni isogu. Fushinjin-sha-tachi wa iu. `Kore wa dainan no hidesu.'
54|9|Kare-ra izen ni, nūfu no min mo (sono yogen-sha o) kyogi to shi, waga shimo be o uso-tsuki yobawari shi,`kichigaidesu.' To itte tsuihō shita.
54|10|Sore de kare wa omoni,`watashi wa, hontōni chikaratsukimashita. Dō ka o tasuke kudasai.' To inotta.
54|11|Sorede ware wa, ten no sho mon o hiraki mizu o sosogi fura seta.
54|12|Mata daichi ni moroizumi o funshutsu sa se, mizu wa awasari, kanete no kami inochi ni yoru koto (kōzui) ga okita.
54|13|Shikashi ware wa ita to kugi de tsukutta mono (hakobune) ni kare o nosete yatta.
54|14|Waga mimamoru naka de sore wa hashitta. Kore ga (mina kara) shirizoke rareta ano mono e no mukuidearu.
54|15|Ware wa kore o hitotsu no shirushi to shite nokoshita. Sate dare ka satoru mono wa aru ka.
54|16|Sā waga chōbatsu to imashime to wa dōdeatta ka.
54|17|Hontōni ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sā, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|18|Ādo (no min) mo (shinri o) kyogidearu to shita. Sorede waga chōbatsu to imashime to wa dōdeatta ka.
54|19|Ware wa saiyaku no uchitsudzuku hi ni, kare-ra ni taishi arekuruu kaze o okutta.
54|20|Suruto ningen wa, nekosogi ni natta. Natsumeyashi no kirikabu no yō ni, mushiri sara reta.
54|21|Ano toki no waga chōbatsu to imashime to wa dōdeatta ka.
54|22|Makotoni ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku tokiakashita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|23|Samūdo (mo mata) keikoku o kyogidearu to shita.

54|25|Watashi-tachi no ma de kare dake ni keiji ga kudasa reta nodesu ka. Iya, kare wa ōuso-tsukidesu.'
54|26|(Ōse rareta. ) `Kare-ra wa ashita shirudearou. Dochira ga daiuso-tsukidearu ka o.
54|27|Hontōni ware wa, kare-ra o kokoromiru tame mesu rakuda o okurudearou. Anata wa taeshinobi kare-ra o mimamore.
54|28|Soshite kare-ra ni rakuda to mizu o bunpai shi, junban ni nomu yō tsutae nasai.
54|29|Daga kare-ra wa nakama o yobiyose, sono otoko wa (ken o) te ni toru to hiza no ken o kitte shimatta.
54|30|Sonotoki no waga chōbatsu to imashime to ga dōdeatta ka.
54|31|Hontōni ware wa, kare-ra ni mukakkate (mimi o tsunzaku) hitokoe o kudasu to, kare-ra wa kachiku no kakoi ni tsukawareru kare kabu no yō ni natta.
54|32|Ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|33|Rūto no min mo keikoku o kyogidearu to shita.
54|34|Ware wa saseki no arashi o kare-ra ni okutta. Rūto no kazoku dake wa betsudeatta. Reimei ni kare-ra o sukui,
54|35|ware kara no onkei to shita. Ko no yō ni ware wa kansha suru mono ni mukuiru.
54|36|(Rūto wa) waga chōbatsu o kare-ra ni keikoku shita nodaga, kare-ra wa sono keikoku ni tsuite giwaku no nen o daita.
54|37|Soshite kare no hinkyaku (tenshi) o, kare kara ubaou to shitanode, ware wa kare-ra no me o tsubushita. `Sā, waga chōbatsu to keikoku o ajiwae.'
54|38|Akuru asa, eien no chōbatsu ga kare-ra ni kudatta.
54|39|`Sā waga chōbatsu to keikoku o ajiwae.'
54|40|Ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sā, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|41|Hontōni firuaun no ichizoku ni mo keikoku-sha ga tsukawasa reta.
54|42|(Daga) ware no shuju no shirushi o kyogidearu to shita. Sorede ware wa, idaide kyōryokuna mono no 一摑 Mi de, kare-ra o toraeta.

54|44|Soretomo kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa mina shōri o eru monodesu.' To demo iu no ka.
54|45|Yagate korera no hitobito wa yabure sari, nige sarudearou.
54|46|Iya (shinpan no)-ji wa, kare-ra ni yakusoku sa reta kigendearu. Shikamo sono tokiniha, mottomo nagekawashī mottomo kurushī me ni audearou.
54|47|Hontōni korera no tsumi o okashite iru-sha-tachi wa, meimō to chōbatsu no uchi ni aru.
54|48|Hi no naka ni kao o shita ni shite hikizura reru sonohi, kare-ra wa,`mōka no fure guai o ajiwai nasai.'(To iwa reyou).
54|49|Hontōni ware wa subete no jibutsu o, kichinto hakatte sōzō shita.
54|50|Mata waga meirei wa tada hitokoto, Shun no yōna monodearu.
54|51|Ware wa kore made, anata gata (makka no tashinkyō to) no dōrui o horoboshita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|52|Kare-ra no shogyō wa, shosatsu ni subete kiroku sa rete iru.
54|53|Daishō subete no koto ga, hitoshiku kakitome rarete iru.

55|1|Jihi amaneku okata ga,
